content.question: ​For the function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math>, it is known that <math alttext="f open parentheses 3 close parentheses equals 0"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="f open parentheses 6 close parentheses equals negative 4"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>6</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></math>. The function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals f open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>. Which of the following must be a solution to <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 0"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
